rest-service.service-description: This is a rest plugin for querying call logs for a particular user. You can invoke it using the URI cdr/{user}?limit=maxrecs&fromdate=yyyymmdd where user is a valid user in your user database, maxrecs is the maximum number of records that can be returned and yyyymmdd is the year/month/day to use as a starting point for the call logs to obtain.
